!Employee of Magic Research Institute Good day and good summer, my dear friend! We're researching new type of plants! No squashes anymore! Watermeleons! Use you usual skills and make those meleons grow up! I've got some seeds for you to use. Collect Nectars and I will exchange them for new type of seeds!
